meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with bright blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: The succory in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I saw a lovely succory plant with blue flowers in the field.
meanings.sent3: The succory seemed to be showing off its vibrant blue petals.
meanings.sent4: The succory stood out among the other flowers like a sapphire in a sea of green.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue succory flowers added a pop of color to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A bitter-tasting plant used in salads and herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The succory in the salad gave it a unique flavor.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the bitterness of succory in the herbal tea.
meanings.sent3: The succory made the salad taste surprisingly interesting.
meanings.sent4: The bitterness of succory lingered on my taste buds like a memory.
meanings.sent5: The herbal medicine contained a hint of succory for its health benefits.

meanings.definition: A type of salad green with curly leaves.
meanings.sent1: The succory leaves added a nice crunch to the salad.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the texture of succory in my salads.
meanings.sent3: The curly succory leaves danced in the salad bowl.
meanings.sent4: The succory leaves curled elegantly like tiny green ribbons.
meanings.sent5: The succory leaves were as crisp as autumn leaves underfoot.
